data.current_summary: Read all property validation rules for an object
data.current_description: Read all properties with validation rules for a given object.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all property validation rules for a specified CRM object type. Returns a collection of validation rules organized by property name, including validation constraints, error messages, and rule configurations. Useful for understanding what validation constraints apply to properties of a given object type before performing data operations.
